mapper.sql: reseller_id, uuid, reseller_name, service_phone, office_address, email_address, email_address_verified, salt, password, status, logging_date, login_date

insert into reseller

uuid,
reseller_name,
service_phone,
office_address,
email_address,

salt,
password,

mapper.update:
update reseller
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reseller_name = #{resellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
service_phone = #{servicePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
office_address = #{officeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_address = #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email_address_verified = #{emailAddressVerified,jdbcType=TINYINT},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
logging_date = #{loggingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
login_date = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where reseller_id = #{resellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update reseller set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reseller_name = #{resellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_phone = #{servicePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, office_address = #{officeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_address = #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_address_verified = #{emailAddressVerified,jdbcType=TINYINT}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logging_date = #{loggingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_date = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where reseller_id = #{resellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
